programme.desc: Denver's real estate market is on fire. So when Wall Street veteran Ken Germain promises big bucks everyone jumps aboard, including his right-hand man Colin Collea. But when the dream turns to dust, a raging mob of those betrayed, scream bloody murder.

programme.title: Broken Trust
programme.desc: A group of suburban teens invite a much-older, rougher young man into their inner circle. They're hoping for thrills and cash. But when these two worlds collide, the crashing result is a murder so vicious and gruesome it haunts the community to this day.

programme.title: Broken Trust
programme.desc: Allen Keith isn't your typical small-town preacher. He also runs a pawn shop, frequented by gold buyers, gun dealers, and fellow pastors. But the pawnshop turns out to be a far cry from the pulpit, and before long and a stone-cold killer is on the loose.

programme.title: Fatal Vows

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: A new winter season starts with Jamie Davis Heavy Rescue split in two. Adam has taken half the fleet north to Alberta's rich and dangerous oil fields, while Jamie stays back to fight and keep the Coq open all by himself.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie hires a new driver but ends up needing rescuing after he crashes Bruce's legendary blue truck. Jamie's stepson Brandon plans to join the Alberta team and is forced to prove himself. Rookie, Colin, learns how tough Adam can be.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Brandon learns that fear is his best friend when it comes to staying alive after a close call on the highway. Jamie helps to save a woman who is trapped in an overturned truck submerged in an icy river.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie is powerless to help when a sudden winter storm slams British Columbia. Two of Heavy Rescue’s crew face a life-or-death situation on a logging road. Adam calls for back up when can't budge a truck that is flipped over a bank.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: In British Columbia, a truck full of wine is sliced in half. Howie is left to tackle his recovery on his own. Al Quiring and Adam Gazzola deal with wrecks on two separate highways.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: After lumber spills across a busy highway, Howie faces an impossible challenge. In northern Alberta, the crew puts the Rotator to the test dealing with heavy industrial wrecks in extreme weather.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Pipe trucks that have rolled over in Alberta and B.C. have crews in both places to open vital highways. A trailer with thousands of bottles of hot sauce jams and is ripped open. Jamie and Brandon compete in a car race on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
